verses.text: Ex kelemtac ab'ec, yujto tzex avtaji yic tzeyik' he jelanil, yic sq'uib' pax he pensar.
Yalnhej b'aj ayex eq'ui, t'a junok tzalan, ma t'a yol b'e, ma b'aj schalaj sb'a b'e, tzex avtaji.
Anhejtona' t'a spuertail he chonhab', tzex avtajpaxi.
E masanil ex anima ayex t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ab'ec.
Ex kelemtac to mantalaj he pensar, k'ayb'ejec he b'ha t'a jelanil. Ex chuk he pensar, sayec jelan pensaril.
Ab'ec wal sik'lab'il, ol alchaj juntzanh tastac niwac yelk'och t'ayex, manhxo jantacoc swach'il.
Te yel tas ol alchaj t'ayex, malaj tas tonhej ol nachajk'eoc.
Masanil juntzanh lolonel tik wach'nhej, malaj jab'oc es t'ay.
Ha heb' jelan, secojtak tz'aj snachajel juntzanh lolonel tik yuj heb'. Ha heb' ay spensar yojtak heb' tas syalelk'ochi.
Hak'ek eyip eyik'an he jelanil yet' aj pensaril, yujto yelxo wal te niwan yelk'och t'a yichanh k'een oro yet' k'een plata.
Yelxo wal te wach' jelanil t'a yichanh k'een k'een te wach' yilji yet' t'a yichanh junok tas snib'aj wal ochi.
Ha jelanil, yetb'eyum sb'a yet' wach' pensaril. Syak' cojtaquejel juntzanh wach' razonal.
Tato ay yelk'och Jehová t'ayonh, sko chakkanel chukal. Tato jelan onh, max yal-laj quik'anchaanh ko b'a. Max ko nib'ejochlaj chuk b'eyb'al yet' es.
Tato ay ko jelanil, syal ko naan junok tas sko k'ulej t'a stojolal, tz'elnhejpaxk'ochi.
Ha yuj jelanil syak' yajalil heb' rey, tojol syutej heb' sch'olb'itan tastac yaj heb' yetanimail.
Yuj jelanil chi', a heb' ayoch yajalil, wach' syutej heb' stanhwan schonhab', wach' pax syutej heb' sb'oan yaj yowal heb' anima.
Ha mach sayanek' jelanil yet' smasanil sk'ool, tz'ilchaj yuj.
Yuj jelanil chi', tz'aj ko b'eyumal, tzonh b'inaj yuj, ay pax quelk'ochi.
Ha tas tz'ilchaj yuj jelanil chi', yelxo te wach' t'a yichanh k'een oro yet' k'een plata sik'b'ileli.
Yuj jelanil, sko b'eyb'alej wach'ilal yet' tojolal.
Ha mach snib'an jelanil, ol yik' sb'eyumal yuj. Ol b'ud'joc spat yuj masanil tastac wach'.
Ha jelanil chi', aytaxoneq'ui ayic ix el yich smunlajel Jehová, ayic manto sb'o masanil tastac,
ayic manto sb'o yol yib'anhk’inal tik,
ayic mantalaj ha' niwac mar, mantalaj pax sjaj ha' niwac ha' sk'euli yet' pax sjaj ha' cotac ha'.
Ayic manto sb'olaj lum tzalquixtac yet' lum niwac witz, ayxoek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ix yik'kanel yich jelanil Jehová ayic manto sb'olaj lum lum tik, mantalaj spokokal jun yol yib'anhk’inal tik ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oank'e satcha’anh masanto b'aj schalaj sb'a yet' ha' mar, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oan asun ay t'a satcha’anh yet' pax yic ix syamanoch waan ha' mar,
ayic ix yalan t'ha ha' mar chi' to manh ol el ha' b'aj aykani yet' pax ix yak'anem yich lum lum tik, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ha yuj sjelanil Dios ix sb'ok'e masanil tastac, ste tzalaj yuj tastac ix sb'o chi', yujto ha' sch'oxanel sjelanil.
Stzalaj yuj yol yib'anhk’inal yet' heb' anima sb'onac.
Axo ticnaik ex anima, ab'ec wal tas tz'alchaj t'ayex, b'eyb'alejec jelanil yic te wach' eyiko'.
Chaec eyab' he k'ayb'ub'al, manh he patiquejel jelanil.
Te wach' yic mach scham wal yab'an lolonel yic jelanil,
yujto a mach tz'ilchaj jelanil chi' yuj, tz'ilchajpax sk'inal, syik'anpax swach'k'olal Jehová.
Palta a mach max chaan yab' lolonel yic jelanil, munil syik'cot yaelal t'a yib'anh.
